kw.name: First page
kw.doc: Test description: This keyword created to access to the first page all the time. We can use keyword as "First page" which open browser with given link Test proceeding: Here goes to see url and browser type from variables parts and based on that opens link Expected output / acceptance criteria: Have to open link in described browser

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Double Click Element
kw.doc: Double clicks the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Double clicking element 'xpath=//section[@class="landingPage__buttons"]//div[@class="button__text" and text()="Kirjaudu sisään"]'.

kw.name: Login as teacher
kw.doc: Test description: Cheks log in process as teacher to be sure all process is working well Test proceeding: In this part we will login with teacher e-mail and password. Before inputing text, its better first to click on text place by click element and clear texts inside wich could be there. In our case it is no default text inside boxes and because of that I disabled those 2 lines. Same process continuse for password writing and finally click to login button to log in the page. Expected output / acceptance criteria: E-mail and password with teacher role can log in succusfully.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//p[contains(@class,'MuiTypography-root MuiTypography-body1 css-yxssz') and contains(text(),'Kirjaudu ulos')]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
